description:
Unleash your full potential on the battlefield with advanced weaponry, including: 
-PIS-30-ARM pistol: a reliable sidearm 
-FMS-1-LEO rifle: a versatile and adaptable rifle for any situation 
-SN-1000-FUT sniper rifle: a state-of-the-art weapon with cutting-edge features for ultimate accuracy 

Receive yours now!
name: S.N.I.P.E.R. - Hunter Scope - Weaponry Upgrade
